cards.name: Aether
cards.description: Aether commands the upper sky, controlling air and cosmic insight.

cards.name: Amphitrite
cards.description: Amphitrite is the queen of the sea, using powerful water-based healing magic.

cards.name: Aphrodite
cards.description: Aphrodite is over this. She can cast ultra love attacks in her sleep.

cards.name: Apollo
cards.description: Apollo is the radiant god of music and prophecy, striking with fiery insight.

cards.name: Ares
cards.description: Ares thrives in battle, bringing destruction with his fiery and earthen fury.

cards.name: Artemis
cards.description: Artemis, the huntress, swiftly strikes her foes with precision and agility.

cards.name: Asterion
cards.description: Asterion, the mighty Minotaur, crushes enemies with his sheer brute force.

cards.name: Astraeus
cards.description: Astraeus, the dusk-bringer, channels celestial wisdom to guide destiny.

cards.name: Athena
cards.description: Athena, the goddess of wisdom, uses strategy and insight to outmaneuver foes.

cards.name: Atlas
cards.description: Atlas, the titan of endurance, bears the weight of the heavens with unyielding strength.

cards.name: Chimera
cards.description: The Chimera, a fearsome hybrid beast, breathes fire and strikes with savage ferocity.

cards.name: Chronos
cards.description: Chronos controls the passage of time, ensuring his strikes land at the perfect moment.

cards.name: Coeus
cards.description: Coeus, the pillar of intellect, empowers his allies with wisdom and strategic foresight.

cards.name: Cronus
cards.description: Cronus, the tyrant of time, wields immense power to reshape fate itself.

cards.name: Demeter
cards.description: Demeter nurtures the land, bringing life and abundance wherever she treads.

cards.name: Dionysus
cards.description: Dionysus, the wild reveler, intoxicates foes and inspires allies alike.

cards.name: Eileithyia
cards.description: Eileithyia, goddess of childbirth, bestows healing and renewal upon her allies.

cards.name: Eos
cards.description: Eos, the dawn-bringer, races across the sky, lighting the way for victory.

cards.name: Erebus
cards.description: Erebus, lord of primordial darkness, cloaks the battlefield in shadow.

cards.name: Eris
cards.description: Eris thrives in chaos, sowing discord and striking when least expected.

cards.name: Eros
cards.description: Eros, the playful archer of love, enchants and manipulates his foes.

cards.name: Gaia
cards.description: Gaia, the primordial mother, shapes the very foundation of existence.

cards.name: Ganymede
cards.description: Ganymede, the divine cupbearer, radiates celestial charm and fortune.

cards.name: Hades
cards.description: Hades rules the underworld, wielding dark earth and insight magic.

cards.name: Harpies
cards.description: The Harpies strike from the skies with relentless speed and chaos.

cards.name: Hebe
cards.description: Hebe, the goddess of youth, restores vitality and strength.

cards.name: Hecate
cards.description: Hecate, the goddess of magic, weaves spells from the shadows.

cards.name: Hephaestus
cards.description: Hephaestus forges weapons of fire and stone with masterful precision.

cards.name: Helios
cards.description: Helios, the sun god, scorches enemies with celestial fire.

cards.name: Hera
cards.description: Hera, the queen of the gods, exerts divine authority and resilience.

cards.name: Heracles
cards.description: Heracles, the legendary hero, overpowers foes with sheer might.

cards.name: Hermes
cards.description: Hermes, the fleet-footed messenger, moves faster than the eye can see.

cards.name: Hestia
cards.description: Hestia, guardian of the hearth, brings warmth and protection.

cards.name: Hyperion
cards.effect: Boosts Fire damage by 20% for all allies.
cards.description: Titan of light and celestial fire, Hyperion burns through the darkness with unmatched brilliance.

cards.name: Hypnos
cards.effect: Has a 50% chance to put an enemy to sleep for 2 turns.
cards.description: God of sleep, Hypnos lulls even the strongest warriors into a peaceful slumber.

cards.name: Iapetus
cards.effect: Reduces enemy defense by 15% when attacking.
cards.description: A warrior among Titans, Iapetus is known for his brutal strength and tactical warfare.

cards.name: Iris
cards.effect: Increases ally speed by 20% for 3 turns.
cards.description: Messenger of the gods and goddess of the rainbow, Iris bridges the realms with divine speed.

cards.name: Mnemosyne
cards.effect: Grants knowledge, increasing allies' attack by 10% for each turn active.
cards.description: Titaness of memory, Mnemosyne grants divine wisdom to those who seek knowledge.

cards.name: Nemesis
cards.effect: Deals extra damage to enemies with boosted stats.
cards.description: Goddess of retribution, Nemesis ensures that hubris never goes unpunished.

cards.name: Nike
cards.effect: Boosts the attack of allies by 15% when active.
cards.description: Goddess of victory, Nike grants triumph to those worthy of greatness.

cards.name: Nyx
cards.effect: Shrouds the battlefield in darkness, reducing enemy accuracy by 20%.
cards.description: Primordial goddess of the night, Nyx holds dominion over the deepest shadows.

cards.name: Oceanus
cards.effect: Heals all allies for 10% HP at the end of each turn.
cards.description: The Titan of the vast ocean, Oceanus nurtures and sustains all life through his endless tides.

cards.name: Pan
cards.effect: Pan's Flute: Calms enemies, reducing their attack by 15% for two turns.
cards.description: The god of the wild, shepherds, and flocks, known for his playful and mischievous nature.

cards.name: Persephone
cards.effect: Cycle of Life: Revives one fallen ally with 50% HP at the start of her turn.
cards.description: The queen of the underworld and goddess of spring growth, embodying life and death.

cards.name: Phobos & Deimos
cards.description: Phobos & Deimos, the twins of fear, strike terror into their enemies.

cards.name: Phoebe
cards.description: Phoebe, the radiant Titaness, grants prophetic insight and celestial wisdom.

cards.name: Poseidon
cards.description: Poseidon rules the seas, causing tidal waves and earthquakes with his mighty trident.

cards.name: Rhea
cards.description: Rhea, the mother of the gods, nurtures and protects with unwavering strength.

cards.name: Selene
cards.description: Selene, goddess of the moon, illuminates the night with her divine glow.

cards.name: Tethys
cards.description: Tethys, the nourishing ocean goddess, grants life to all living beings.

cards.name: Thanatos
cards.description: Thanatos, the personification of death, moves swiftly to claim souls.

cards.name: Theia
cards.description: Theia, the goddess of sight, sees through deception and illuminates truth.

cards.name: Triton
cards.description: Triton, the herald of the seas, commands ocean waves with his mighty conch shell.

cards.name: Tyche
cards.description: Tyche, the goddess of fortune, grants luck to those she favors.

cards.name: Uranus
cards.description: Uranus, the primordial sky god, watches over the heavens with celestial might.

cards.name: Zeus
cards.description: Zeus, the king of the gods, wields thunderbolts and commands the skies.

elementAttacks.name: Boulder
elementAttacks.description: Hurls a massive boulder at the opponent, causing them to be stunned.

elementAttacks.name: Wave
elementAttacks.description: Summons a powerful wave that drenches the enemy, reducing their speed.

elementAttacks.name: Wind
elementAttacks.description: Creates a powerful gust of wind that pushes the enemy back, delaying their next move.

elementAttacks.name: Lightning
elementAttacks.description: Strikes the enemy with a bolt of lightning, paralyzing them temporarily.

elementAttacks.name: Fire
elementAttacks.description: Unleashes flames that cause the target to take burning damage over time.

elementAttacks.name: Growth
elementAttacks.description: Promotes rapid growth, healing the user and boosting their stats.

elementAttacks.name: Decay
elementAttacks.description: Causes the enemy to decay, reducing their stats over time.

elementAttacks.name: Light
elementAttacks.description: Blinds the enemy with a burst of light, reducing their accuracy.

elementAttacks.name: Shadow
elementAttacks.description: Shrouds the enemy in darkness, causing them to flee in fear.

elementAttacks.name: Love
elementAttacks.description: Charms the enemy, causing them to act against their allies.

elementAttacks.name: Malice
elementAttacks.description: Infuses the enemy with malice, causing them to attack themselves.

elementAttacks.name: Wisdom
elementAttacks.description: Enlightens the user, increasing their attack and defense.

elementAttacks.name: Hubris
elementAttacks.description: Exploits the enemy's overconfidence, dealing massive damage.

specialAttack.name: Discus Throw
specialAttack.effect: Hurls a mighty discus at the enemy, dealing damage and stunning them for the next turn.

ultraAttack.name: Herculean Strength
ultraAttack.effect: +30% Attack & Speed for all friendly cards on the board.

classAttacks.name: Beast
classAttacks.effect: Summons a powerful beast to attack the enemy.

specialAttack.name: Savage Pounce
specialAttack.effect: A ferocious leap deals extra damage and causes the enemy to flinch, lowering their attack power.

ultraAttack.name: Pack Ambush
ultraAttack.effect: Summons a pack of beasts to attack all enemies at once, reducing their speed.

classAttacks.name: Blessing
classAttacks.effect: Restores a small amount of HP and boosts defense.

specialAttack.name: Divine Favor
specialAttack.effect: A holy light restores HP to all allies and grants them increased resistance to debuffs.

ultraAttack.name: Divine Blessing
ultraAttack.effect: All allies gain 30% HP back & 20% Defense boost.

specialAttack.name: Explosive Barrage
specialAttack.effect: Fires a rapid volley of cannonballs, dealing damage to all enemies.

classAttacks.name: Curse
classAttacks.effect: Afflicts the enemy with a weakening hex, reducing their attack power.

specialAttack.name: Hex Mark
specialAttack.effect: Places a dark curse on the enemy, lowering their attack and speed for 3 turns.

ultraAttack.name: Eternal Curse
ultraAttack.effect: All enemies permanently lose 15% Attack & Speed.

classAttacks.name: Decree
classAttacks.effect: Forces the enemy to skip their turn.

specialAttack.name: Royal Command
specialAttack.effect: Issues a commanding decree that forces the enemy to skip their next turn and lowers their morale, reducing their attack power.

ultraAttack.name: Absolute Decree
ultraAttack.effect: All enemies skip their next turn.

specialAttack.name: Lucid Nightmare
specialAttack.effect: Plunges the enemy into a vivid nightmare, putting them to sleep and dealing damage over time for 3 turns.

ultraAttack.name: Endless Dream
ultraAttack.effect: All enemies sleep for 2 turns. They wake up if hit, but take double damage.

classAttacks.name: Influence
classAttacks.effect: Persuades the enemy to lower their guard, reducing their defense.

specialAttack.name: Compel
specialAttack.effect: Forces the enemy to act against their will, skipping their next turn.

ultraAttack.name: Mass Hysteria
ultraAttack.effect: All enemies attack each other (50% chance per enemy to randomly hit an ally or themselves).

classAttacks.name: Luck
classAttacks.effect: Increases critical hit chance for the next attack.

specialAttack.name: Gambler’s Favor
specialAttack.effect: Increases the user's attack power significantly, but has a 50% chance of missing.

ultraAttack.name: Opportunist
ultraAttack.effect: User attacks twice next turn, both guaranteed crits.

classAttacks.name: Medicine
classAttacks.effect: Restores a small amount of HP and removes minor debuffs.

specialAttack.name: Panacea
specialAttack.effect: Fully restores HP of one ally and cures all status effects.

ultraAttack.name: Comforts of Home
ultraAttack.effect: Fully heals 1 ally and removes all debuffs.

classAttacks.name: Prophecy
classAttacks.effect: Marks an enemy with a doomed fate, dealing heavy damage after 2 turns.

specialAttack.name: Fated End
specialAttack.effect: Marks an enemy for destruction—after 1 turn, they take 30% of their max HP as damage.

ultraAttack.name: Judgment Foretold
ultraAttack.effect: Marks all enemies—after 2 turns, they take 40% of their max HP as damage.

classAttacks.name: Vine
classAttacks.effect: Entangles the enemy, reducing their speed and evasion.

specialAttack.name: Strangling Roots
specialAttack.effect: Roots the enemy in place, preventing movement and dealing damage over time.

ultraAttack.name: Overgrowth
ultraAttack.effect: All enemies immobilized for 2 turns. -25% Speed.
